turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I need you to pick me up a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, which Starbucks do you want me to go to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go to the one on N. Eastman Road in Kingsport.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, great. What would you like me to get?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to try the new Black and White Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What size drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Coconut milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should I get whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, extra whipped cream actually.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, sounds good. Hot or cold?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do hot today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. How about any extra flavors?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I do a pump of sugar-free peppermint?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, sadly that isn't offered.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I add any other flavors?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No. Sorry.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay well that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, so a grande white and black mocha, hot, with coconut milk and extra whipped cream from the Starbucks on N. Eastman Road in Kingsport?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Exactly!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I'll take care of it!
